name: TetraScape
description:
In the game, the player controls one of four switchable characters, each with their own ability to complete puzzles and survive combat.

A Game developed for the subject of Video Game Development @ FEUP

Developed by: 

Francisco Lopes
José Freixo
Matilde Freilão
Sérgio Salgado
Tiago Carvalho
Vítor Magalhães

Artists: Marcelo Figueiredo and Laila Testa
Sound designers: Catarina Cruz and Hugo Ferreira
